abstract: Royal Dutch Shell has increased its offer for the oil and natural gas exploration company Cove Energy, in an effort to expand into the fast-growing natural gas industry in East Africa.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell has increased its offer for the oil and natural gas exploration company Cove Energy, in an effort to expand into the fast-growing natural gas industry in East Africa.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Royal Dutch Shell increased its offer on Tuesday for the oil and natural gas exploration company Cove Energy, as Shell seeks to expand into the fast-growing natural gas industry in East Africa.

headline.main: Shell Lifts Cove Energy Bid to $1.8 Billion
